source:
/**
 * Archive a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to archive
 * @returns Result of the archive operation
 */
export declare function archiveRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Unarchive a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to unarchive
 * @returns Result of the unarchive operation
 */
export declare function unarchiveRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Delete a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to delete
 * @returns Result of the delete operation
 */
export declare function deleteRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Schedule a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to schedule
 * @param publishAt - ISO datetime string of when to publish the release
 * @returns Result of the schedule operation
 */
export declare function scheduleRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string, publishAt: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Unschedule a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to unschedule
 * @returns Result of the unschedule operation
 */
export declare function unscheduleRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Publish a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to publish
 * @returns Result of the publish operation
 */
export declare function publishRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;

source:
/**
 * Archive a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to archive
 * @returns Result of the archive operation
 */
export declare function archiveRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Unarchive a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to unarchive
 * @returns Result of the unarchive operation
 */
export declare function unarchiveRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Delete a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to delete
 * @returns Result of the delete operation
 */
export declare function deleteRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Schedule a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to schedule
 * @param publishAt - ISO datetime string of when to publish the release
 * @returns Result of the schedule operation
 */
export declare function scheduleRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string, publishAt: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Unschedule a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to unschedule
 * @returns Result of the unschedule operation
 */
export declare function unscheduleRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;
/**
 * Publish a release
 *
 * @param projectId - Sanity project ID
 * @param dataset - Dataset name
 * @param releaseId - ID of the release to publish
 * @returns Result of the publish operation
 */
export declare function publishRelease(projectId: string, dataset: string, releaseId: string): Promise<any>;

source:
/**
 * Tools module
 *
 * This file re-exports all tool definitions and provides functions
 * to get and execute tools from across the different tool modules.
 */
import { ToolDefinition } from '../types/tools.js';
/**
 * Get all tool definitions
 *
 * @returns All tool definitions
 */
export declare function getToolDefinitions(): ToolDefinition[];
/**
 * Get a specific tool definition by name
 *
 * @param toolName - The name of the tool to retrieve
 * @returns The tool definition or null if not found
 */
export declare function getToolDefinition(toolName: string): ToolDefinition | null;
/**
 * Execute a specific tool by name with the provided arguments
 *
 * @param toolName - The name of the tool to execute
 * @param args - Arguments to pass to the tool handler
 * @returns Result of the tool execution
 * @throws Error if the tool is not found
 */
export declare function executeTool(toolName: string, args?: Record<string, any>): Promise<any>;

source:
/**
 * Tool definitions registry
 *
 * This file provides a central registry for all MCP tool definitions,
 * aggregating them from specialized tool providers.
 */
import { ToolDefinition } from '../types/tools.js';
/**
 * Get all tool definitions
 *
 * @returns Array of tool definition objects
 */
export declare function getToolDefinitions(): ToolDefinition[];
/**
 * Get a specific tool definition by name
 *
 * @param toolName - The name of the tool to retrieve
 * @returns The tool definition object or null if not found
 */
export declare function getToolDefinition(toolName: string): ToolDefinition | null;
/**
 * Execute a tool by name with the provided arguments
 *
 * @param toolName - The name of the tool to execute
 * @param args - The arguments to pass to the tool handler
 * @returns The result of the tool execution
 */
export declare function executeTool(toolName: string, args?: Record<string, any>): Promise<any>;
